title: Obituary: Father Frances 'Frank' Kulhawik
content: Father Frances "Frank" Kulhawik, 100, of Crookston, MN, formerly Twin Valley, MN, died Wednesday, September 02, 2015, in Villa St. Vincent, Crookston. Funeral Mass will be held on Tuesday, September 8, 2015, at 11:00 a.m. at St. William Catholic Church, Twin Valley. Visitation will be Monday September 7 from 2:00-3:00 p.m. a Prayer Service at 3:00 p.m. in St. William Catholic Church. Visitation will be one hour prior to the service at the church on Tuesday.  Arrangements are entrusted to Anderson Family Funeral Home, Twin Valley, MN Online Guestbook at www.andersonfamilyfh.com
